entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 27.
